column1: NHS staff must be provided with the support needed to keep the public safe after a case of Coronavirus was identified in Wales, Plaid Cymru Shadow Minister Rhun ap Iorwerth AM has said. #Coronovarius(COVID19) #health #Hospitals #nhs #plaidcymru #wales https://walesnewsonline.com/plaid-cymru-call-for-support-for-nhs-staff-in-light-of-coronovarius-covid-19/
